5 f. of text & 20 f. of text with com. Seperately paginated; Edges torn.
Folios 1-37 missing; hence only 7 folios; begins and ends abruptly, top right margins torn.

Folios 1-3 missing; hence only 3 folios. Begins & ends abruptly.
A work dealing with genders and synonyms; Edges torn.
F.1 missing; begins abruptly. folios 2,3 torn and attempts are made to repair them; text damaged. बोपदेव's काव्यकामधेनुवृत्ति is his commentry on his own कविकल्पद्रुम.

All अध्यायs separately paginated, folios of अध्यायs I, II, VII, VIII have larger size (a), other have smaller size (b). Foll. in the beginning of I, II torn and text damaged. Foll. in II are ruled by double red lines for margins.
Foll 1-6 have text & 1-15 have वृत्ति - both separatly paginated. वृत्ति ends abruptly.
The Ms. has two parts with separate pagination 1-68, 1-107, F.76 is numbered twice. Section on सुप् & तिङ् from मध्यमनोरमा of रामशर्मा on the मध्यसिद्धान्तकौमुदी of वरदराज.
F. 1-3, 5, 15, missing; begins and ends abruptly.
Text, F. 1-11; Commentary F. 1-30 seperately paginated.
पदरत्न in 64 कारिकाs gives cryptic rules & examples about vedic पाठs, accent etc. चतुर्ज्ञान exponuds the same.
Last two foll. torn, text damaged, numbering lost; Ends abruptly. परिभाषार्थमञ्जरी is a com. On  परिभाषेन्दुशेखर of  नागोजी भट्ट. It also called  भीमा after the name of the author.
Collection of various परिभाषाs. Edges torn.
Ends abruptly; text damaged on all foll. on the left.
